mapper.select:
select
distinct
from project
order by ${orderByClause}

select p.*,area.ID,area.NAME aname, intermediary.intermediary_id,intermediary.intermediary_name from project project LEFT JOIN area area ON p.area_id = area.ID LEFT JOIN intermediary intermediary ON project.project_intermediary = intermediary.intermediary_id where p.project_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into project ( project_name, area_id, project_status, project_topic_status, project_logo, project_introduction ) values ( #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{projectTopicStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{projectLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update project
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_contact_user_id = #{projectContactUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_create_user_id = #{projectCreateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_owner_contact = #{projectOwnerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_owner_contact_tel = #{projectOwnerContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_status = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
project_create_time = #{projectCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
project_update_time = #{projectUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

project_topic_status = #{projectTopicStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update project set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{area.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_logo = #{projectLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_introduction = #{projectIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select project.*,area.ID,area.NAME aname, intermediary.intermediary_id,intermediary_name from project project LEFT JOIN area area ON project.area_id = area.ID LEFT JOIN intermediary intermediary ON project.project_intermediary = intermediary.intermediary_id LEFT JOIN project_user project_user ON project.project_id = project_user.project_user_pid LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user dingtalk_user ON project_user.project_user_userid = dingtalk_user.userid LEFT JOIN project_contacts project_contacts ON project.project_id = project_contacts.project_contacts_pid LEFT JOIN contacts contacts ON project_contacts.project_contacts_cid = contacts.con_id WHERE project.project_status = #{projectStatus} and project.project_intermediary = #{intermediary.intermediaryId} and project.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{projectName},'%') and dingtalk_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contactsName},'%')
order by ${od}
SELECT p.project_id,p.project_name from project p WHERE p.project_status = 1
